name: Shaken but Not Stirred!
storyline:
You are unexpectedly summoned by "M", the head of the Secret Service.

After Miss. Cashcoin has shown you into the office, "M" outlines the situation.

A jet Fighter has mysteriously disappeared whilst on a training mission. No wreckage has been found but it is known that the plan e was carrying a nuclear missile .

Your task is to locate the plane and its deadly cargo, and defuse the missile.
summary: A UK only 007 text adventure for the ZX Spectrum.
